parameter.definition: Dyad height (distance from TT to jSR [um]
parameter.label: Dyad height (um)

parameter.definition: Flag to include guide points below jSR membrane (use when dyad height is at least 30nm)
parameter.label: Use dyad guide points

parameter.definition: Domain size along X axis in microns
parameter.label: Domain size (X) [um]

parameter.definition: Number of 31nm sides along jSR height
parameter.label: # of jSR segments (Z)

parameter.definition: Domain size along Y axis in microns
parameter.label: Domain size (Y) [um]

parameter.definition: Domain size along Z axis in microns
parameter.label: Domain size (Z) [um]

parameter.definition: Radius from center of TT beyond which troponin and SERCa are present [um]
parameter.label: Troponin/SERCA radius [um]

parameter.definition: Brief description of mesh parameter set
parameter.label: Description

parameter.definition: Number of 31nm sides along jSR arc
parameter.label: # of jSR segments (circumference)

parameter.definition: LCC channel placement where 0's indicate empty space and 1's indicate channels on a grid with 31nm x 31nm spacing. Must be rectangular. This grid is centered in the dyadic space.
parameter.label: LCC (0/1-valued rectangle)

parameter.definition: Number of (~30nm) sides around the TT
parameter.label: # of TT segments (circumference)

parameter.definition: RyR channel placement where 0's indicate empty space and 1's indicate channels on a grid with 31nm x 31nm spacing. Must be rectangular. This grid is centered in the dyadic space.
parameter.label: RyR (0/1-valued rectangle)

parameter.definition: Number of 31nm sides along length of the TT
parameter.label: # of TT segments (Z)
